titlestmt.titleproper: Sebeochrana, všeobecně prospěšné stavební družstvo, s. r. o.
titlestmt.subtitle: Self-Protection, general-benefit construction cooperative, Ltd. / NAD 1785
titlestmt.author: This archival description was created by the Jewish Museum in Prague in the framework of the cooperation between EHRI and the Yerusha project.

did.unittitle: Sebeochrana, všeobecně prospěšné stavební družstvo, s. r. o.

origination.name: Self-Protection, general-benefit construction cooperative, Ltd., Prague 11 – Žižkov

odd.p: Self-Protection, general-benefit construction cooperative, Ltd. / NAD 1785

custodhist.p: There is no detailed information on the history of the fonds.

bioghist.p: There is no detailed information on the history of the originator of the fonds.

scopecontent.p: The fonds contains sources for the social and building history of the city of Prague in 1921-1949. It also contains materials on Jewish history, namely the issues of several Jewish flats, especially from the period of the occupation (Inv. No. 6-17)

arrangement.p: The archival materials are organized in the fonds as follows: A. Books, B. Files.

otherfindaid.p: Kopečková, J.: Sebeochrana, všeobecně prospěšné stavební družstvo, s. r. o. 1921-1949. Prozatímní inventární seznam, 2003, 2 s., ev. č. 219.
